content: meet the market day bandana - the first in my market day series designed to be a cute accessory for your summer market trips it includes a simply repeating pattern and a pretty picot border this pattern is perfect for new crocheters who have mastered the basic stitches and want a small project to learn new stitches and techniques finished measurements tip to tip - 28 depth 8 yarn approximately 60 grams of dk weight yarn heavy dk-light worsted yardage approximately 150 yards needles g techniques chain single double and half-double_crochet picot slip stitches
